overview:
Elliott is a talented freelance developer based in the United Kingdom. His skill sets include HTML/CSS, Ruby on Rails and Symfony.

He was employed by Carsonified until December 2008, at which point he began freelance work.

Elliott build Spreadtweet, a Twitter client disguised as a spreadsheet, in early 2009. Since then, he has worked on a number of interesting projects, and is well-known for building applications for Twitter.
